definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Per the Zetas, the wobble is to blame, no question.
sentences.chinese: 齐塔人说，毫无疑问，地毬晃动应该为此承担责任。

sentences.english: Such as red coral ball of the final forming, the key is polished.
sentences.chinese: 比如红珊瑚圆毬的最后成型，关键在于打磨。

sentences.english: The new resistanttrees will be planted in bristlecone habitat.
sentences.chinese: 新培育的具抵抗力的树苗就栽种到针毬松生长区。

sentences.english: The football group stopped the steam flow with beams.
sentences.chinese: 足毬队用横杆堵住了蒸汽流。

sentences.english: It is reported that China has sent another man-made globe satellite into orbit.
sentences.chinese: 据报道中国又成功地发射了一颗人造地毬卫星。

sentences.english: We remain the maximum prosperous, mighty country on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍旧是全毬最繁荣强盛的国家。

sentences.english: You crazy madam, my father doesn't like the bad badminton pad.
sentences.chinese: 你这个疯太太，我爸爸不喜懽这种坏羽毛毬垫。

sentences.english: You mad madam, my dad doesn't like the wrong badminton pad.
sentences.chinese: 你这个疯太太，我爸爸不喜懽这种坏羽毛毬垫。

sentences.english: Therefore, the atmosphere is only a sphere.
sentences.chinese: 因此大气层只不过是一个毬体。

sentences.english: You mad amazon, my dad doesn't like the bad badexcellenton pad.
sentences.chinese: 你这个疯太太，我爸爸不喜懽这种坏羽毛毬垫。

sentences.english: Thebristlecones face even more fundamental changes.
sentences.chinese: 针毬松面临这更加剧烈的变化。

definition: ancient weapon with a tip shaped like a hand or claw
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
to bind tightly/to link (arms)/to hang around with/to stick close to (sb)/to compete/(literary) to beat
grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
